Article.ArticleTitle: Genome Sequences of 16 Enterovirus Isolates from Environmental Sewage in Guatemala, 2019 to 2021.

Abstract.AbstractText: Enteroviruses can cause human infectious disease. We report 16 near-complete genome sequences of enteroviruses that were isolated through environmental surveillance of wastewater in Guatemala.
